data: The note 'Server Migration Reminder' outlines a scheduled server migration on April 20th that requires backing up all databases.
The note 'Server Migration Reminder' instructs notifying the devops team prior to carrying out the server migration.
The note 'Server Migration Reminder' emphasizes checking compatibility of custom scripts before the migration.
The note 'Server Migration Reminder' identifies sending a reminder email about the migration as a key action item.
The note 'Server Migration Reminder' identifies verifying script compatibility as a key action item.
The note 'Server Migration Reminder' calls for confirming backup integrity after completing the migration as a follow-up task.
